question: The State Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission will hear complaints of how much worth?
option1: more than Rs 1 lakh but less than Rs 10 lakh
option2: more than Rs 10 crore but less than Rs 50 crore
option3: more than Rs 1 crore but less than Rs 10 crore
option4: more than Rs 5 crore but less than Rs 10 crore
answer: more than Rs 1 crore but less than Rs 10 crore
explanation: The State Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission provided in Consumer Protection Act, 2019 will hear complaints of more than Rs 1 crore but less than Rs 10 crore.
